problem_text: If N Q and V X are medians, \triangle P N R \sim \triangle W V Y, N Q = 8, P R = 12, W Y = 7 x - 1, and V X = 4 x + 2, find x.
compact_text: If NQ and VX are medians, \triangle PNR \sim \triangle WVY, NQ = 8, PR = 12, WY = 7x-1, and VX = 4x+2, find x.
annotat_text: If $\overline{NQ}$ and $\overline{VX}$ are medians, $\triangle PNR \sim \triangle WVY, NQ=8, PR=12,WY=7x-1,$ and $VX=4x+2,$ find $x$.
